WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TYRREHNIAN SEA.
ITALY.
DNC 08.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS 03 THRU 08 MAR BY CABLESHIP
   PIERRE DE FERMAT IN AREAS WITHIN 3 MILES OF:
   A. 38-27.8N 010-47.6E.
   B. 37-59.6N 011-18.6E.
   C. 37-57.0N 011-18.3E.
   ONE MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 09 MAR 21.
